ComicInfo.Summary:
Training Tips: Facts about training dogs.
Killer!: Lad is accused of killing a neighbor's colts. He is taken to New York City, where he becomes separated from his owners. After a series of adventures he returns to his owners.
Canine Cowpoke: Mongrel dog Rex rescues his master from being attacked by a bull.
Ancient Beliefs About Dogs: Facts about dogs in ancient cultures.
Dogs At War: Facts about the use of dogs in war.
ComicInfo.Title: Training Tips; Killer!; Canine Cowpoke; Ancient Beliefs About Dogs; Dogs At War
